item.title: A new theme for the site
item.description: A junior bald eagle flying over Juanita Bay. Applied a new theme for the site Initially, this blog was a place for me to quickly store (and search) the ideas I have during job hunting. But now I want it to be a place to host my ideas, my photos. Unlike all other large social medias, this is a place I have 100% control and I can share high quality photos without worrying the impact of compress algorithm.
